abstracts.cdata!:
The Sixth Industrial Imports Project
            will enable selected priority industries in India to
            maintain and expand their production of capital goods and
            agricultural chemicals by supplying part of their
            requirements of foreign exchange for the import of
            materials, components and spare parts.
